title: Looking for a typeface similar to Saul Bass "Love in The Afternoon" movie poster
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know of a typeface that I could use for a Saul Bass inspired piece of work? I'd like something that looks like the lettering used in this poster.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100421071804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/392px-Love_in_the_Afternoon_6065.jpg)
author: Dr MOON

comments.content:
This is too cartoony and friendly but you might like it anyways:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sailor/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100421071804/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sailor/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/sailor/")

Mikey :-)
Nice suggestions Tom. House Industries' [Shag Lounge](http://web.archive.org/web/20100421071804/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22) also has a similar and has a lowercase.
Saul Bass, he da man. B^)
